thread.title: Tony M
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Tony M

author: Tony M
title: Tony M
text:
At first was hesitant to try because I had never heard of this flower company. But after three orders that have been placed, the others have been deleted from my contacts.
The flowers have always lasted more than a week. The recipients have always commented on the freshness of the flowers. Delivery has always been as scheduled
